description: Matthew Keading is a huge fan of dubstep music.  It's fast, pumping rhythms make him wanna move and gyrate. Matthew didn't know Ashton had a crush on him, but he does now!  He's bending Ashton over and sliding his stiff meat into that tight, Twink hole.  The dubstep music seems to have awakened these boys' hyper-sexual appetite, and only a hard, solid pounding will satisfy their need for intensity!  Enjoy!
title: Dubsex
